rules_text: Mill three cards. Put a permanent card from among the milled cards into your hand.
notes:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/68a3Gn

OG_3:
Mill three cards. You may put a permanent card from among the milled cards and put it into your hand.



Redbay’s feedback:
Wondering if you can mill one more card. Seed of Hope costs {1} less, mills one less card, and gains the player 2 life, for comparison. 

OG_2:

Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put an artifact, creature, or land from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.


OG_1:
Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put an artifact, creature, or land from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
